Graf-Python Module - PyFeature.py¶

class PyFeature.PyFeature(name=None, value=None)[source]¶

A name/value pair. The “value” of a C{PyFeature} may be a string or another Py{FeatureStructure} object.

Methods

  • value – C{str} or C{PyFeatureStructure}
